result.execSummary:
The defendant Theodore C Schneider was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Theodore C Schneider

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Theodore C Schneider in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Pursuant to plea negotitions and on motion of the state, Court ordered charge AMENDED to a County Ordinance Statute 63.042, Theft, to which defendant plead guilty.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered defendant to pay a forfeiture of $100.00 INCLUSIVE by September 15, 2016 or a civil judgment be entered.
Court ordered all previous conditions to remain the same.
Court ordered previously issued warrant canceled and all conditions of bail to remian.

Defendant Theodore C Schneider in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State needs additional time for victim notification. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31. Plea and Sentencing hearing scheduled March 15, 2016 at 1:30pm.
Justice Point Program Discharge Summary Report dated 02/29/2016; received and filed.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($500.00 signature bond) gj
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Theodore C Schneider not in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defendant informed to appear to address Justice Point Program today in the a.m.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited. Court ordered case remains calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing on March 1, 2016 at 8:30 a.m.
Justice Point Program violation; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Theodore C Schneider in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Justice Point Program report dated February 16, 2016; received and filed. Court reviewed violation and attorney is in another Court. Court ordered case adjourned for bail/bond hearing in Branch 31 on February 18, 2016 at 8:30 a.m. State does not object.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing. No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription. Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings. Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Theodore C Schneider in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Defendant Theodore C Schneider in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: AMI
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rifelj, Branch 31.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 17, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Current: 3654 E. Munkwitz, Cudahy, WI 53110   (Effective: 02-04-2016)
Prior: 3803 East Underwood Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($200.00 signature bond) gj
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Daniel E Meylink in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea/calendar call. Court ordered stayed warrant lifted. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Bench Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.

Attorney Daniel E Meylink in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. For reasons stated on the record,   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next scheduled hearing.  Calendar call scheduled for September 24, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Theodore C Schneider in court with attorney Daniel E Meylink.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Theodore C Schneider
Current: 3803 East Underwood Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110   (Effective: 07-31-2015)
Prior: 3803 East Underwood Avenue, Cudahy, WI 53110

Defendant Theodore C Schneider in court.  Thomas L. Potter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.37  for a Pretrial Conference.vb
No use or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 08-13-2015 at 08:30 am.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 7/31/15 @ 1:30 pm
